name: War Games: Pirates Versus Ninjas - A 2 player and Multiplayer Combat Game
name_original: War Games: Pirates Versus Ninjas - A 2 player and Multiplayer Combat Game
description:
This is the best and most popular 2 player and multiplayer game in the app store! Better than Tetris!

Play against your friends on the same device! Or play against the computer!

Rated best 2 player game by GameQuest!

Game play is addictive says Mobile GameTech!

Up in the middle of the night? Be entertained!

Features:
- Two player competitive mode allows for endless 1-on-1 gameplay
- Single player mode is challenging and rewarding
- Quick games allow for fun on the go
- Plenty of game play options
- Unlock new characters in two player and one player mode!

*** Simple to play strategy game for quick bursts of fun!***
